name: Shaheen Fatima
content: Shaheen Fatima | Computer Science | Loughborough University Dr Shaheen Fatima Senior Lecturer Publications +44 (0) 1509 222 677 Send email Office: N.3.15 (Haslegrave Building) Biography Research Responsibilities I am a Senior Lecturer in the Department of Computer Science. My research interests lie in the area of autonomous agents and multiagent systems, specifically in resource allocation in multiagent systems using market based methods, and in agent mediated negotiation for the domain of electronic commerce using techniques from game theory. Research areas Multiagent Systems Game Theory Negotiation Artificial Intelligence Departmental Equality and Diversity Coordinator Foundation Year Tutor Project Coordinator (PGT) Research Student Seminar Coordinator
